imdb.plot outline: After meeting a larger than life music promoter, Tracii Guns (LA Guns & Guns and Roses) is given an opportunity of putting his old LA Guns band back to work on a new album to be recorded at the SugarBush Compound and Recording Studio. What ensues is only Rock n Roll...but we like it!
imdb.title: SugarBush: TheLA Guns Sessions
plot: After meeting a larger than life music promoter, Tracii Guns (LA Guns & Guns and Roses) is given an opportunity of putting his old LA Guns band back to work on a new album to be recorded at the SugarBush Compound and Recording Studio. What ensues is only Rock n Roll...but we like it!::Swim Pictures
